section.name: Overview
section.p: Axis is an Open Source project that provides the fundamentals for SOAP services. One of the pieces missing from the Axis puzzle currently is easy deployment of existing java classes and components as SOAP services. The AxisService seeks to fulfill this need by allowing easy deployment of SOAP services at runtime without generated stubs or classes.

section.name: Quick Start
section.p: There are two ways to use the AxisService. You can either use it to configure services dynamically. Or you can use it with the standard WSDD Configuration.
